_source.short_desc: The Cloud Phone System of choice for modern sales and support teams. We help end clueless conversations by adding context to every call
_source.long_desc:
The Cloud Phone System of choice for modern sales and support teams. We help end clueless conversations by adding context to every call. Call software, virtual numbers, SMS campaigns, native CRM integrations, and lots more at just $30 per user. 
Sign up and get a 14-day free trial.
_source.pricing_details:
Standard- $30/user per month, billed monthly and $24/user, billed annually. 
Premium- $60/user per month, billed monthly and $48/user, billed annually. 
Custom- Pricing available on request

Visit https://justcall.io/pricing for further details.
_source.target_audience:
JustCall is power-packed with features that help teams scale without scaling complexities. JustCall gives back 12 hours per week per rep on an average. 
Sign up and get a 14-day free trial.

related_products.short_desc: Complete cloud phone system that is easy to set up and easy to manage.
related_products.features:
RingCentral MVP is a cloud-based business communications system with enterprise-grade voice, fax, text, online meetings, conferencing, and collaboration.

With RingCentral MVP, you can easily connect your office, remote and mobile employees under one phone system, regardless of their location.

Unlike expensive, conventional phone systems, RingCentral MVP is purchased, activated, set up, and managed online, which means we manage it and you use it.

related_products.short_desc: GoToConnect combines Jive's VoIP phone systems with GoToMeeting's video conferencing into one simple, reliable and flexible solution.
related_products.features: GoToConnect (formerly Jive) combines cloud VoIP phone systems with GoToMeeting's web, audio and video capabilities into one simple, flexible solution. Users can meet, talk, and collaborate via web browser, desktop application, or desk phone with features ranging from virtual voicemail, and call forwarding, to secure video conferencing and screen sharing. For as low as $19.95 a month, GoToConnect eliminates the hassle and expense of managing multiple collaboration solution providers.

related_products.short_desc: Dialpad modernizes communication technology, putting voice, messaging, meetings, and video on any device.
related_products.features: Dialpad is a modern cloud-based Unified Communications system that keeps teams connected by making all of their telephony needs available on any device. Dialpad Talk's native Voice Intelligence features boost productivity with real-time transcription and post-call summaries, including highlighted action items. Plus integrations with G Suite, Office 365, Zendesk, and Salesforce create rapid deployments and automatic syncing with the apps your team uses everyday.

related_products.short_desc: Agile CRM is a complete sales, marketing and service suite designed to let SMBs to sell and market like the Fortune 500.
related_products.features: Agile CRM Call Recording - Make, receive, record, and analyze calls without leaving your CRM. With Agile?s built-in call recording and advanced telephony capabilities, you can say goodbye to partial recollection of telephone calls, improve sales performance, and always stay on top of your customer and prospect relationships.

related_products.short_desc: CallHippo is an Easy to Use Phone System while providing world-class support. It can be setup Instant and provide advanced reporting.
related_products.features: CallHippo is a modern business phone system that helps you connect with your customers. CallHippo is easy-to-use while offering robust functionality with advanced features like Power Dailer and Automatic call distribution. Our Extensive reporting and seamless integrations empower sales and service teams to have effective conversations with customers. Providing World-Class support 24*7 and Accessible by desktop and mobile-app, CallHippo is trusted by over 5000 companies worldwide.

related_products.short_desc: Twilio provides simple, pay-as-you-go APIs for businesses to build scalable, reliable voice and SMS apps for the web or mobile devices.
related_products.features: Twilio is the worlds leading cloud communication platform that enables you to engage customers across channels - SMS, voice, video, email, WhatsApp and more. Pay-as-you-go APIs allow businesses to scale communications reliably.

related_products.short_desc: EngageBay is a simple, affordable all-in-one marketing, sales and service CRM software to acquire, engage, nurture, close leads.
related_products.features: EngageBay is a simple, affordable, all-in-one marketing, sales and service CRM software built for small businesses and startups to acquire, engage, nurture web visitors and convert them to happy customers. Acquire leads through lead generation forms and popups, engage web visitors through beautiful landing pages, nurture them through engaging emails, and automate your marketing funnel through marketing automation - all from one easy to use platform.

related_products.short_desc: CloudTalk is a cloud-based phone system for support and sales teams. We make calling easy and fun! Get your FREE trial today!
related_products.features: CloudTalk is a smart phone system with advanced call tracking functionality.  Over 2,500 businesses - including DHL, Yves Rocher and Glovo - rely on CloudTalk for its superior call quality and call tracking capabilities. Make things easier for your sales and customer support teams with 70+ tracking features and easy integrations with your existing Helpdesk, CRM and eCommerce systems. It's the perfect phone system for mid-sized companies looking to grow. Try a 14-day trial, absolutely FREE.

related_products.short_desc: CallSource helps marketers to prove the lift and value of their campaigns by tracking every call back to what drove them to convert.
related_products.features: Level up your marketing channels - automatic online and offline call tracking. Keyword level dynamic number insertion with the most accurate analytics available. Businesses who want to improve their marketing by optimizing ads, campaigns, keywords, and their content can thrive with our digital marketing solutions.

related_products.short_desc: CallRail's Call Tracking helps you understand what makes your phone right and personalize inbound call experiences.
related_products.features: CallRail's Call Tracking makes it easy for businesses of all sizes to turn more leads into better customers. Serving more than 200,000 businesses and integrating with leading marketing and sales software, our Call Tracking and analytics solutions helps you understand what makes your phone ring and which ad, campaign, or search term got their attention before you pick up the phone.

related_products.short_desc: Close is the all-in-one sales engagement CRM designed to help SMBs turn more leads into revenue.
related_products.features:
Close is the sales engagement CRM designed to help SMBs turn more leads into revenue. At Close, were dedicated to the business of the future: smart, agile teams who work remotely. If you're a tech-enabled team who needs to scale without overpaying for enterprise software, you've found the right sales tool. Close lets you email, call, and text your leads, all without add-ons.

Packed with productivity tools like task reminders and Power Dialer, you'll reach more leads and follow up more often.

similar_products.short_desc: CallRail's Call Tracking helps you understand what makes your phone right and personalize inbound call experiences.
similar_products.features: CallRail's Call Tracking makes it easy for businesses of all sizes to turn more leads into better customers. Serving more than 200,000 businesses and integrating with leading marketing and sales software, our Call Tracking and analytics solutions helps you understand what makes your phone ring and which ad, campaign, or search term got their attention before you pick up the phone.

similar_products.short_desc: Invoca is the leading conversation intelligence platform for revenue teams in marketing, contact centers, eCommerce and CX.
similar_products.features: Invoca's Active Conversation Intelligence platform enables marketing, sales, customer experience, and eCommerce teams to understand and immediately act on the information consumers share via conversations. Through deep integrations with leading technology platforms, revenue teams can turn conversation data into automated action to enhance every digital touchpoint and human interaction, leading to better experiences, more conversions, and higher revenue.

similar_products.short_desc: CTM lets you track & attribute leads, from any source, giving you data to confidently make marketing decisions & increase conversions.
similar_products.features: CallTrackingMetrics is a global conversation analytics provider giving marketers data to make confident strategy decisions. Over 100,000 users, including The Washington Post, Verizon Connect, and ServiceMaster, rely on CTM to make data-driven advertising decisions. CTM integrates with core tools marketers use every day like Google Ads and Analytics, Hubspot, Salesforce, Zoom, and Facebook.

similar_products.short_desc: GoToConnect combines Jive's VoIP phone systems with GoToMeeting's video conferencing into one simple, reliable and flexible solution.
similar_products.features: GoToConnect (formerly Jive) combines cloud VoIP phone systems with GoToMeeting's web, audio and video capabilities into one simple, flexible solution. Users can meet, talk, and collaborate via web browser, desktop application, or desk phone with features ranging from virtual voicemail, and call forwarding, to secure video conferencing and screen sharing. For as low as $19.95 a month, GoToConnect eliminates the hassle and expense of managing multiple collaboration solution providers.

similar_products.short_desc:
Get marketing clarity, with call tracking.
Tie phone calls to marketing. Instantly capture phone calls and the marketing responsible.
similar_products.features:
Get marketing clarity, with call tracking.
A new lead management tool built for marketers and business owners to capture and measure your marketing effectiveness. See a clear picture of what marketing is growing sales.
Try our 14 Day Free Trial.

Capture Calls. Tie phone calls to marketing. Instantly capture phone calls and the marketing responsible.

similar_products.short_desc: CallSource helps marketers to prove the lift and value of their campaigns by tracking every call back to what drove them to convert.
similar_products.features: Level up your marketing channels - automatic online and offline call tracking. Keyword level dynamic number insertion with the most accurate analytics available. Businesses who want to improve their marketing by optimizing ads, campaigns, keywords, and their content can thrive with our digital marketing solutions.

similar_products.short_desc: Sierragold by SAI's InQuery is a fast, reliable & secure call record query application. Access historical and current CDR,  24/7.
similar_products.features:
Sierragold by SAI's InQuery is a web-based, fast, and reliable call record query application running on the Linux OS. It uses a very current database & other technologies ensuring data security, reliability, and ease of use.  The modern interface allows for efficient searches of historical or current call records. The online application is available 24/7 to authorized personnel using today's top web browsers.   

At SAI our mission is to help enterprises simplify a complex telecom environment.

similar_products.short_desc: LiveVox is a next-generation contact center platform integrating omnichannel communications, CRM, Practical AI, and WFO in one solution
similar_products.features: LiveVox's Call and Screen Recording Capabilities is a fully integrated solution that provides complete visibility on 100% of agent-customer interactions to help drive performance, quality, and compliance via synchronized screen, call, and multichannel recording capabilities. Their Unified platform allows managers to easily search, play, score, and report on multichannel interactions and drop in on live calls.  Recordings are securely stored in the LiveVox cloud and readily accessible.

similar_products.short_desc: All-in-one sales automation solution that includes call tracking and call routing. Route calls via shotgun, round-robin, or criteria.
similar_products.features:
ClickPoint is an all-in-one sales and marketing solution to improve sales contact rates dramatically.  
ClickPoint clients contact more than 50% of their leads on average, and reach contact rates as high a as 70%. ClickPoint makes it easy for salespeople to dial their prospects while automated texting and email marketing reach customers at the right time in their buying journey.

similar_products.short_desc: Call Tracking Software that tracks all inbound and outbound calls, increases sales, and analyzes metrics with ease.
similar_products.features: LeadSquared's Call Tracking Software integrates perfectly with CallTrackingMetrics to improve caller experience and track all inbound and outbound calls. Capture all inbound phone calls and voicemails, directly make outbound calls, avoid lead duplication, maintain call logs and reports, route incoming calls to the right agents, and more. Monitor the number of calls received, outbound calls made, missed calls, calls that led to conversions, average time spent, etc.

similar_products.short_desc: Our products include: Auto Dialer, Cloud Phone System, Progressive Dialer, CRM & Lead Management, and Email & SMS Marketing Automation.
similar_products.features: Ricochet360 is the All-in-One Auto Dialer, CRM/Lead Management, and Marketing Automation Platform that creates predictable revenue outcomes by automating 95% of your agents daily sales workflow. Designed for both inbound & outbound agents looking for a competitive advantage, Ricochet360 enables your team to call a new lead in less than one second, then automatically nurture and engage prospects throughout the entire sales process.

similar_products.short_desc: Find out which ads drive calls with Ringostat Call Tracking. Know which ad, campaign, or keyword got attention of your customers.
similar_products.features:
Find out which ads drive calls. 
If your business relies on quality customer conversations, you need Ringostat. Special offer! Get Ringostat with a benefit of up to 30% until 30.09.22

Use call tracking opportunities to maximize marketing impact and generate more sales for the same budget. Ringostat has everything you need to solve this task as efficiently as possible: 97% accuracy, Smart substitution script, Calls segmentation, Recording and listening of calls etc.

similar_products.short_desc: Turn website visitors into sales calls.  Use CallPage and provide immediate free phone callback to your leads in 28 seconds.
similar_products.features:
CallPage is an industry leader in providing automatic callback software and call tracking solutions. 

With customizable widgets, CallPage enables businesses to generate up to 75% more inbound calls from their website visitors! Visitors can request instant calls and CallPage will connect them to your consultant in just 28 seconds. 

CallPage is also ideal for customer service and call centers.  With call scheduling and voice messaging features, you can improve your customers' experience.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Business Intelligence software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Business Intelligence tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Business Intelligence software enables companies to access, analyze and share information in order to improve decision-making through gathering performance metrics. By providing an infrastructure for compiling, analyzing and distributing key data, Business Intelligence applications facilitate more accurate reporting and monitoring as well as strategy implementation and assessment. Business Intelligence software is related to Reporting software, Knowledge Management software and Survey software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Call Center software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Call Center tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Call Center software automates and standardizes the process of receiving and responding to customer phone calls. These solutions enable better monitoring of the customer experience, workflow management and evaluation of employee performance. Whether designed for virtual or site-based locations, Call Center applications manage and catalog the process of customer calls and often allow customers to track the progress of their request via the internet. Call Center software is related to Customer Service software and Help Desk software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Campaign Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Campaign Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Campaign Management software enables organizations to automate the tracking, delivery, reporting and analysis of marketing campaigns and promotions through the integration of customer data sources and the ability to parse the data through a broad range of analytic searches. Using this type of marketing campaign reporting allows organizations to evaluate and optimize multiple campaigns for different business sectors based on real-world analysis of their effectiveness. Campaign Management software is related to Email Marketing software, Marketing Automation software and Search Marketing Automation software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Lead Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Lead Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Lead Management software enables the forecasting, collection and tracking of sales leads. Through the use of Lead Management solutions, organizations can automate and manage their prospect database as well as share and distribute leads throughout the enterprise. Organizations can also use Lead Management tools to track the progress of leads, analyze the performance of sales staff and marketing campaigns and develop new leads from their existing customer base. Lead Management software is related to Contact Management software and Sales Force Automation software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Reporting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Reporting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Reporting software applications allow real-time access to essential data as well as the rapid generation of multidimensional reports from diverse data sources. Among many other uses, Reporting software can generate financial statements, track the success of sales strategies, monitor responsiveness to regulatory compliance concerns and manage internal controls or security audits. Reporting software is related to Business Intelligence software and Survey software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Sales Force Automation software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Sales Force Automation tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Sales Force Automation software manages an organization's sales force functions which can include: lead management, customer account management, contact management, quote management, forecasting, customer demographics and employee performance management. Sales Force Automation applications improve sales productivity while providing a method of distribution for sales analytics throughout an enterprise. Sales Force Automation software is related to Commission software, Contact Management software, Lead Management software and Quoting software.

category_features.name: Collaboration Tools
category_features.definition: Ability to work collectively on a project while communicating and sharing information within the system in real time

category_features.name: Contact Management
category_features.definition: Store and find contact information such as names, addresses, and social media accounts

category_features.name: Content Delivery
category_features.definition: Distributing content through various platforms or channels

category_features.name: Content Management
category_features.definition: Creating, updating, monitoring accuracy, and ensuring brand consistency for all written materials that are distributed to stakeholders.

category_features.name: For Sales Teams/Organizations
category_features.definition: Caters to sales teams

category_features.name: Lead Management
category_features.definition: Store information about leads and contacts and track them through the sales process

category_features.name: Training Management
category_features.definition: Track employee's progression through training programs

category_features.name: Call Logging
category_features.definition: Keep a record of all calls in and out of a call center

category_features.name: Call Recording
category_features.definition: Record the audio of phone conversations for quality assurance purposes

category_features.name: Call Routing
category_features.definition: The procedure of sending voice calls to a specific queue based on predetermined criteria

category_features.name: Caller ID
category_features.definition: Identify the number and contact information of a caller before answering the phone

category_features.name: Caller Profiles
category_features.definition: Store caller information within an accessible database

category_features.name: Live Chat
category_features.definition: Ability to chat online in real time

category_features.name: Video Conferencing
category_features.definition: Adds audio/visual capabilities for users to communicate

category_features.name: CRM
category_features.definition: Contact and lead management to track interactions and notes about clients and prospects

category_features.name: Mobile Access
category_features.definition: Access the software remotely via mobile devices

category_features.name: Multi-User Collaboration
category_features.definition: Two-way actions and data sharing between several users in real time

category_features.name: Access Controls/Permissions
category_features.definition: Define levels of authorization for access to specific files/folders

category_features.name: Alerts/Notifications
category_features.definition: Alerts/notifications within the system

category_features.name: Call Conferencing
category_features.definition: Facilitate virtual conferences that connect multiple people remotely

category_features.name: Call Monitoring
category_features.definition: Listen in on live phone conversations to train and assess agent performance

category_features.name: Call Recording
category_features.definition: Facilitate virtual conferences that connect multiple people remotely

category_features.name: Call Routing
category_features.definition: The procedure of sending voice calls to a specific queue based on predetermined criteria

category_features.name: Call Screening
category_features.definition: Access caller ID Information including number of the caller to decide how to treat the call

category_features.name: Contact Management
category_features.definition: Store and find contact information such as names, addresses, and social media accounts

category_features.name: IVR / Voice Recognition
category_features.definition: Reads and accepts a combination of touch tone keypad selections and voice inputs to provide the appropriate prerecorded voice response

category_features.name: Online Voice Transmission
category_features.definition: Transmit voice and other information digitally

category_features.name: SIP Trunking
category_features.definition: Session Initiation protocol (SIP) trunking enables the connectivity to send and receive calls over the internet

category_features.name: Unified Communications
category_features.definition: Consolidate and integrate communication tools as one platform or entity to enhance business communication and collaboration

category_features.name: Voicemail Transcription
category_features.definition: Transcribe voicemail audio messages to written text that is sent over email

related_products.short_desc: Zendesk provides the complete customer service solution that's easy to use and scales with your business.
related_products.features: Zendesk is the only complete customer service solution, that is both easy to use and scales with your business. On average, companies using Zendesk increase customer satisfaction by 25% and agent productivity by 30% - at any scale. All your customer interactions live in a single, dynamic interface with features like web widgets, pre-defined ticket responses, and a full customer history. Get up and running quickly, and expect to see results even faster.

related_products.short_desc: Great customer service starts with better Telephony software. Win more customers by providing excellent customer service with LiveAgent
related_products.features:
Discover how easy it can be to provide professional inbound call support. Connect a VOIP provider, set up smart call routing, custom IVR and more.
Companies like BMW, Yamaha, Huawei, Orange or Forbesfone use LiveAgent to deliver customer wow to 150M end users worldwide.  Start with a 14-Day trial, no credit card needed, no contracts.

LiveAgent is a multi-channel help desk software with 180+ help desk features including live chat, phone support, social media integrations, support portal and API.

related_products.short_desc: A seamless solution to unleash the power of cloud business communications.
related_products.features: RingCentral MVP offers widespread business support by being easily administered across all your locations, incorporates all your users, includes diverse calling options, and integrates your preferred accessory or device smoothly.

related_products.short_desc: A seamless solution to unleash the power of cloud business communications.
related_products.features: RingCentral MVP offers widespread business support by being easily administered across all your locations, incorporates all your users, includes diverse calling options, and integrates your preferred accessory or device smoothly.

related_products.short_desc: Talkdesk is an intuitive, cloud-based telephony solution with advanced features, comprehensive reporting and seamless integrations.
related_products.features: Talkdesk Enterprise Contact Center Platform empowers companies to make customer experience a competitive advantage. With enterprise class performance and consumer-like ease of use, Talkdesk's telephony platform easily adapts to the evolving needs of sales and support teams and their end-customers, resulting in increased customer satisfaction, productivity and cost savings. Over 1,400 innovative enterprises around the world rely on Talkdesk to power their customer interactions.

related_products.short_desc: GoToConnect combines Jive's VoIP phone systems with GoToMeeting's video conferencing into one simple, reliable and flexible solution.
related_products.features: GoToConnect (formerly Jive) combines cloud VoIP phone systems with GoToMeeting's web, audio and video capabilities into one simple, flexible solution. Users can meet, talk, and collaborate via web browser, desktop application, or desk phone with features ranging from virtual voicemail, and call forwarding, to secure video conferencing and screen sharing. For as low as $19.95 a month, GoToConnect eliminates the hassle and expense of managing multiple collaboration solution providers.

related_products.short_desc: Bitrix24 #1 free business cloud telephony system, CRM and telemarketing solution used by 8 million businesses worldwide.
related_products.features: If you are looking for a free VoIP phone system for your small business, Bitrix24 is what you need. Unlike other voip solutions, Bitrix24 works both as your internal PBX system and as contact center for inbound and outbound calls. It's also the only free voip system that comes with fully featured free CRM. Importantly, when you clients call you from a phone number recorded in CRM, they will be identified, connected to assigned manager and their phone calls will be logged and recorded.

related_products.short_desc: Cloud contact center software that offers VR, skills-based routing, AI, call blending, and analytics.
related_products.features: NICE CXone Voice as a Service (VaaS) telephony is a contact center connectivity suite delivering quality optimized cloud voice and data services that enable quality connections between agents and customers, while allowing organizations to save money through a low latency, optimized, least-cost routing mix on a global scale.

related_products.short_desc: Dialpad Talk modernizes telephony technology, putting voice, messaging, meetings, and video on any device.
related_products.features: Dialpad Talk is a modern cloud-based business phone system that keeps teams connected by making all of their telephony needs available on any device. Dialpad Talk's native Voice Intelligence features boost productivity with real-time transcription and post-call summaries, including highlighted action items. Plus integrations with G Suite, Office 365, Zendesk, and Salesforce create rapid deployments and automatic syncing with the apps your team uses everyday.

related_products.short_desc: CallHippo is an Easy to Use Phone System while providing world-class support. It can be setup Instant and provide advanced reporting.
related_products.features: CallHippo is a business Telephony system that helps you connect with your customers. CallHippo is easy-to-use while offering robust functionality with advanced features like Power Dailer and Automatic call distribution. Our Extensive reporting and seamless integrations empower sales and service teams to have effective conversations with customers. Providing World-Class support 24*7 and Accessible by desktop and mobile-app, CallHippo is trusted by over 5000 companies worldwide.

related_products.short_desc: Get the perfect phone number for your small business and turn the world into our office with the Grasshopper virtual phone system.
related_products.features: Turn the world into your office with Grasshopper, the virtual phone system for small businesses. Get a local, toll free, or vanity phone number to represent your business or bring your own number! Forward calls anywhere and use our mobile and desktop apps to communicate with clients over voice or text, be notified in real time of missed calls & voicemails, and have your voicemails transcribed and sent via email. Try us risk free for 30 days with our money-back guarantee.

similar_products.short_desc: Aircall is the modern telephony solution designed to integrate with your favorite business tools. Numbers available in 100+ countries.
similar_products.features: Make every phone conversation count and give time back to your reps. Aircall's flexible telephony solution integrates with 80+ CRM, helpdesk, and other critical business tools to surface the information your reps need to be successful, when they need it. Join 9,000+ companies that trust Aircall to strengthen their customer and prospect relationships with first-class phone features like: SMS, advanced call routing, IVR, analytics, power dialer, call tagging, and other collaborative features.

similar_products.short_desc: Boost sales team productivity 4x with our top-rated Power Dialing and Sales platform. Blend phone/email/SMS and close deals faster.
similar_products.features: Have More LIVE Conversations in 15-Minutes Guaranteed! We're so confident you'll boost outbound sales with our power dialer, you can use our full product for FREE without a credit card. Here's why we're confident: 1) Dial leads 4x faster 2) No awkward pauses after contact answers 3) Drop voicemails/emails in 1-click 4) Automate post call workflows 5) No special equipment needed. Powerful yet easy to use!

similar_products.short_desc: Variphy is the preferred analytics and management platform for Cisco Collaboration.
similar_products.features:
Variphy is the preferred analytics and management platform for Cisco Collaboration.

Variphy provides all the functions you need in a single pane of glass. We built our products and features with the feedback and requests of Unified Communications professionals like you.

Discover what's possible with Variphy:

- Dashboards, UCCX Wallboards, & Widgets
- CUCM CDR Reporting & Call Analytics
- UCCX Reporting & Analytics
- Cisco CUBE CDR Reporting
- Variphy Cloud
- and more!

similar_products.short_desc: One-click video calling links powered by a SaaS PBX with configurable call groups. Unchanging links that call dynamic call groups.
similar_products.features:
A cloud PBX for browser-based, WebRTC calling. Provides "Infinity Team LInks" for one-click video, audio and IM calling. Links are assigned to configurable call groups through easy-to-use portal. Callers clicking these links are routed to available agents within the call group. Call groups can be instantly updated with whomever is currently available to answer. 
Infinity Links can be used in websites, email, CRM apps, video kiosks, SMS/Text, etc.
Integrated scheduling calendar for missed calls.

similar_products.features: Phone.com offers a virtual phone system to manage phone greetings, menus, routing, extensions, voicemail, conferencing, fax, SMS, MMS, forwarding, and more. In addition to offering a variety of innovative, customizable and cost-effective communications solutions, Phone.com delivers award-winning U.S. based customer support to customers across America.

similar_products.short_desc: Unlimited Voice, SMS, Fax, Chat, Video. Fully Customizable and Scalable to fit your Needs. All with our Award-winning 24/7/365 support.
similar_products.features:
ULTATEL is a recognized industry leader in business telephony systems. With the power of cloud technology, we help businesses empower their people to be more productive and connect with their customers wherever they are.

Our plans come fully customizable and scalable with unlimited Voice, SMS, Fax, Chat, and Video.
 
As an integration pioneer, ULTATEL can do much more than build a great phone system. We can integrate with your existing systems to get you the results you want, seamlessly.

similar_products.short_desc: Connect your business to partners and clients from anywhere in the world with Zadarma's phone numbers in over 100 countries.
similar_products.features: Having a comprehensive telephone system is essential for businesses across all industries. With Zadarma you can open virtual international offices from anywhere in the world in a matter of minutes with a help of phone numbers in over 100 countries. A choice of mobile, landline and toll-free numbers allows any company to find the best fit at an attractive rate.

similar_products.short_desc: Send calls and/or text messages to a list of contacts within seconds. Used by churches, non-profits and many other businesses.
similar_products.features: Send a phone call or text message to an entire list of phone numbers in seconds.  The DialMyCalls platform allows you to easily send voice or SMS broadcasts right from any PC or mobile device.  No calling hardware required, you're able to send thousands of messages per minute using our extensive hardware network.  Try us out completely free today and see why thousands of organizations use DialMyCalls.

similar_products.short_desc: With SkySwitch, resellers can offer their end-users communication and collaboration services with ease even if they are not experts.
similar_products.features: SkySwitch offers the ultimate white-label UCaaS platform for MSPs, VARs, System Integrators, Interconnects and like providers to quickly brand as their own and resell to their customer base.  Get up and running selling a hybrid workforce solution -- UCaaS/hosted voice -- in as little as 90 days. Expand your service offerings and revenue stream. Our top resellers on average annualized growth rate is 40%.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Call Accounting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Call Accounting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Call Accounting software helps businesses gain insights into call logs, telephone usage and cost trends. Call Accounting solutions help create accountability for telecom resources across corporate departments. They also help to eliminate vendor over-billings by automating invoice processing. Within organizations, Call Accounting software helps to identify unused telecom resources as well as to offer insight into call and cost trends. Call Accounting software is related to Telecom Expense Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Call Center software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Call Center tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Call Center software automates and standardizes the process of receiving and responding to customer phone calls. These solutions enable better monitoring of the customer experience, workflow management and evaluation of employee performance. Whether designed for virtual or site-based locations, Call Center applications manage and catalog the process of customer calls and often allow customers to track the progress of their request via the internet. Call Center software is related to Customer Service software and Help Desk software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top IVR software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of IVR tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Interactive Voice Response (IVR) software, allows call centers, help desks and other organizations to create menus which the caller can navigate using spoken commands or their telephone keys. IVR software is mainly used for systems that allow callers to select information or enter data without the need for assistance. IVR systems can also be used to route callers to the appropriate department within an organization, based on their answers to qualifying questions.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Telecom Expense Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Telecom Expense Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Telecom Expense Management software automates the process of monitoring, auditing and reducing telecom billing expenses. These applications aid call centers, help desks and other organizations measure, manage, predict and optimize expenditures related to their telephone systems. Telecom Expense Management solutions also aid in distributing key performance data throughout an enterprise as well as forecasting for infrastructure investment and eliminating internal fraud. Telecom Expense Management software is related to Billing and Provisioning software and Call Accounting software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top VoIP software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of VoIP tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: VoIP software enables voice and data transmission over the Internet which allows for enhanced employee mobility. This type of software provides extensive call reporting capabilities and often supports other functions, such as instant messaging and group conferencing, in addition to standard telephony features.
